channel.title: scene on Haden Liu
channel.description: Recent content in scene on Haden Liu

item.title: Capstone Project - Supervised Learning Based Prediction on Commerical Flight Delaying
item.description: In my final project of DSI course, I choose the US cities flight records data during Janaury 2020. I used various classification algorithms to get the feature importances on factors that have impact to predict whether a future flight will be delayed. I also attempted the NLP techniques to calculate the feature importances of features with object datatype and see their impacts on the delaying status of flight. Link to Github Repo

item.title: Project 4: Web Scraping Job Postings
item.description: In this project, I used BeautifulSoup package to scrap the data science job details from Indeed website. I also applied NLP techniques such as TF/IDF models to doing feature importance analysis on the factors impact on the job classification and salary Link to Github Repo

item.title: Project 1: Game programming and analysis
item.description: In this project, I created and modified the elements and features with Python data structures and control flow to assist the online gaming development. Link to Github Repo
